TSH-EVENTLOOP
data.body:
Implemented AtomicEventLoop based upon the DukTape Ecmascript event loop example.  Modified this by removing the reliance on sockets and instead subscribing to the Atomic.engine update and postUpdate events.

Also implemented a version of setImmediate/clearImmediate

data.title: Adding Jake + Jakefile
data.body: Since we included node binaries to be able to compile TypeScript without having tsc installed, we can now facilitate building the Atomic binaries with Jake and not require having Ruby installed.
